items.content_html: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
items.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
